body:
Listen...

We all have some members on this server who is working a little bit with youtube..
And, as I know it, Mineplex, a very big server, allows Youtube Channel Advertisement. Why not do That?
We have a few players like Ciaan, Eric, Spoook, Jotre, Lego and Murph who has a youtube channel, and if they upload videos on this server and also advertises their youtube channel on the Mineplex website, maybe some players wants to join this server through his/her channel :)

Of course we have more members on this server who has youtube! Just do that and we will probably get some awesome new players to Avicus!!

btw, It was a pretty while since i was on the Mineplex website, but I think there was a link called "Youtube Showcase"
Show everyone your channel, make like a trailer for this server and lets go! We have probably got some new players!! 

Hope you like my idea! And if you did and have youtube, do this because you're not allowed to advertise servers through the Mineplex website, but I think it should be allowed to advertise servers from a Youtube channel!

I have no idea about how it is on the Hypixel Network, but if it is allowed there to, just do it! 
I think that we will probably get some new players to the server and maybe they tell their friends, who tells their friends, and boom.. we are back on the road again!!
body_tagged:
Listen...

We all have some members on this server who is working a little bit with youtube..
And, as I know it, Mineplex, a very big server, allows Youtube Channel Advertisement. Why not do That?
We have a few players like Ciaan, Eric, Spoook, Jotre, Lego and Murph who has a youtube channel, and if they upload videos on this server and also advertises their youtube channel on the Mineplex website, maybe some players wants to join this server through his/her channel :)

Of course we have more members on this server who has youtube! Just do that and we will probably get some awesome new players to Avicus!!

btw, It was a pretty while since i was on the Mineplex website, but I think there was a link called "Youtube Showcase"
Show everyone your channel, make like a trailer for this server and lets go! We have probably got some new players!! 

Hope you like my idea! And if you did and have youtube, do this because you're not allowed to advertise servers through the Mineplex website, but I think it should be allowed to advertise servers from a Youtube channel!

I have no idea about how it is on the Hypixel Network, but if it is allowed there to, just do it! 
I think that we will probably get some new players to the server and maybe they tell their friends, who tells their friends, and boom.. we are back on the road again!!
title: How we can get some more players on Avicus!

replies.body:
We have community creations where you can make a video hub or make a thread for each video that is Avicus related: https://avicus.net/forums/categories/42
Also a thread with most/all youtube channels: https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/ace02bcd8
replies.body_tagged:
We have community creations where you can make a video hub or make a thread for each video that is Avicus related: https://avicus.net/forums/categories/42
Also a thread with most/all youtube channels: https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/ace02bcd8

replies.body:
Most of the youtubers aren't interesting to some players from what I've heard. Plus, it gets boring watching a kid put music in the background and kill people. I, for instance, haven't watched a minecraft video for about a year.

And it's not even about YouTube, or spreading the word, it's the server. The community in-game is bad, the only gamemode everyone plays in nebula, so if a player wants to try another gamemode out, that's hopeless. Honestly, the only youtubers that I think would do this server any good is Porky and Vlad. The rest upload tryhard scrims, kill some people, put music, and win with the other team salty. They upload that every time.

Again, there's a lot more to take in. Our staff, our community, etc. So once you get some good Youtubers, consider this

Again, there's a lot more to take in. Our staff, our community, etc. So once you get some good Youtubers, consider this

replies.body:
Youtube won't work, we haven't big youtubers on our server.
The only thing. that may help, is voting.
replies.body_tagged:
Youtube won't work, we haven't big youtubers on our server.

replies.body:
I don't really appreciate your 'feedback' and I'd like to mention a few things. 

It takes time to record, edit and render videos of this server. We try our best to make them as entertaining as possible; we upload them because we enjoy it, not because we want to become some huge and famous youtubers with millions of subscribers.  

At least I don't sit behind a computer screen trash talking people on a minecraft server forum. At least we do try to increase the publicity of this server. At least we enjoy it as a hobby.

replies.body:
You're triggered

It doesn't matter to me if you appreciate it or not. And I'm glad you don't sit behind your computer and trash talk on the forums, because neither do I. I'm actually sitting with some friends at a restaurant rn behind my phone, not trash talking. This wasn't directed to certain youtubers, but feedback to everyone as a whole.

And really? This is trash talking? I hope you never play a sport lmao

And now I'm triggered

replies.body: I'm offended
replies.body_tagged: I'm offended

replies.body:
What is there to record on avicus?

Avicus isn't competitive enough to record things such as scrims and be enjoyable to watch.

It's concept is one based on a competitive nature but people are laid back about it.

The most entertaining thing to watch on avicus are false ban montages and montages where if you have enough skill, destroy people on pub servers etc, which is obviously outclassed in that sense by gamemodes such as UHC.

replies.body: If you want to create a thread about you coming back, click "introduce yourself" and click "new discussion". There, you can make a thread

And now I'm triggered

reply_to.body:
Most of the youtubers aren't interesting to some players from what I've heard. Plus, it gets boring watching a kid put music in the background and kill people. I, for instance, haven't watched a minecraft video for about a year.

And it's not even about YouTube, or spreading the word, it's the server. The community in-game is bad, the only gamemode everyone plays in nebula, so if a player wants to try another gamemode out, that's hopeless. Honestly, the only youtubers that I think would do this server any good is Porky and Vlad. The rest upload tryhard scrims, kill some people, put music, and win with the other team salty. They upload that every time.

Again, there's a lot more to take in. Our staff, our community, etc. So once you get some good Youtubers, consider this

replies.body:
Hello saaaaam!

That is also a way to get more players on Avicus.
It is not a bad idea.

I, as well run a YouTube channel.
I have started it not too long ago.

It is not a bad idea, but at the same time, I will say what vladthegreat100 said:

"We have community creations where you can make a video hub or make a thread for each video that is Avicus related: https://avicus.net/forums/categories/42
Also a thread with most/all youtube channels: https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/ace02bcd8"

We can use that for uploading videos for anything Avicus-related.

It is a nice suggestion though....
I hope to see you in game!

replies.body:
Hi NowImTriggered!

You do have a point there.
Therefore, I will tell you something:

I have noticed the same thing. (it is not just you xD)
So, I am editing, and making a video at the moment.
Before vacation ends, I promised myself that I would upload a showcase of Avicus (approx. 3 minutes).
I will explain two or three things, and make my comment on Avicus.

Because my channel is not well-known yet, it may not spread like fire.
But there is no harm in trying xD

This is my answer to this comment.
I hope this works out :)
Anyways, stay strong, and I will see you in game.
